quoteText: While Bitwarden processes all User Personal Information in the United States, our third party vendors may process data outside of the United States or the European Union.
title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
tosdr.tldr: Privacy Policy: "While Bitwarden processes all User Personal Information in the United States, our third party vendors may process data outside of the United States or the European Union."
